channel.title: Ffmpeg on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Ffmpeg on Arrans github.io

item.title: AlexxIT/go2rtc
item.description: Ultimate camera streaming application with support RTSP, RTMP, HTTP-FLV, WebRTC, MSE, HLS, MP4, MJPEG, HomeKit, FFmpeg, etc.

item.title: caydey/ffshare
item.description: An android app to compress image, video and audio files through ffmpeg before sharing them

item.title: jeanslack/FFcuesplitter
item.description: FFmpeg based audio splitter for CDDA images associated with .cue files

item.title: mmastrac/automedia
item.description: A set of tools for automatically managing bitrot and format in large quantities of media
